name: Space Crossings
description:
who,  why, where and when.

I was challenged by my friend Xanderwood to remake one of his games. I chose Crossy Kitty, but I didn't have it in me to have a cat be run over over and over...so I gave it another setting: SPACE!

what and how.

I decided not to dead ass copy Crossy Kitty and so I gave it a twist and changed the controls.

Controls:

click anywhere to move towards that direction.

Objective:

find the collectibles and bring them back to the drop-off point (basically at the start) before the time runs out
